config.circuitBreakerServiceSplunkQuery: index=app mmpcdiscountengine executeCircuitBreaker sourcetype=orangelog context="discount-engine" | stats max(executeCircuitBreaker_time), min(executeCircuitBreaker_time), avg(executeCircuitBreaker_time), count(eval(searchmatch("executeCircuitBreaker"))) as numCalls, count(eval(executeCircuitBreaker_time < 750)) AS slaCount
